entry.title: No in app support
entry.content: With no way to contact customer support while travelling with only my phone and no computer, there is no way to contact scotiabank customer service via chat in this app. Had to Facebook message them instead. Build in a text response please. Not always possible to call in.

entry.title: Bring back advertised features
entry.content: App was great before the whole redesign took for ever to look at crdit scored like a year for the ability to. Now i have discovered once again it doesn't do what they advertise it to do. That is the inability to send money via imessage and text message. Please fix this! In its current state it can only send fund through email while before you could easily as i did this all the time. Scotiabank icon dose not show up anywhere in the imessage/text feild where you can select of iMessage capable apps. Even called customer support and they were useless and had no idea what i was talking about till i dumbed it down and then they just pretty much shrugged and sorry cant help you

entry.title: Used to be amazing
entry.content: This app used to be simple and manageable. Now it is one of the worst banking apps that I have ever used. Confusing, non transparent, and IMPOSSIBLE to reach help if you are struggling. Disappointed with the whole experience and will definitely be looking for alternative services with better customer interface.

Used to be amazing

This app used to be simple and manageable. Now it is one of the worst banking apps that I have ever used. Confusing, non transparent, and IMPOSSIBLE to reach help if you are struggling. Disappointed with the whole experience and will definitely be looking for alternative services with better customer interface.

entry.title: Overdraft
entry.content:
Hello
I am enjoying Scotia Bank but I wanted to share with you that if you look in my account you’ll see a lot of NSF this is a problem because I’m getting charge from you guys.
The bank of Montreal takes out money twice a month for a car payment I have two loans I have one with you and one with the bank of Montreal.
Because the bank of Montreal does not take it out consistently on the same day as I had discussed is causing me a problem in my account which is affecting my credit it’s putting me in the hole.
It’s making it difficult it’s caused me to miss multiple payments for my car but yet if you look at my other car payment with you guys there’s not one missing payment
I am now thinking of whether I should just shut my account down and get my check given to me and only go to the bank to cash a check and to take the money and pay everything myself.
I need a solution I need your assistance I need an overdraft I work as a healthcare professional in the community and Cornwall I’ve been with this company for the last year and a half I get paid every two weeks on a Thursday I don’t get very much it’s 1389 every two weeks. When payments come out of my account it’s usually just before I get paid and this causes an NSF I’ve asked for help before with an overdraft I believe because of the NSF‘s this is tarnishing my account please let me know I need a solution .I need your help and I need an overdraft of $500 or even less it could be 300 I need your help

Overdraft

Hello

I am enjoying Scotia Bank but I wanted to share with you that if you look in my account you’ll see a lot of NSF this is a problem because I’m getting charge from you guys.

The bank of Montreal takes out money twice a month for a car payment I have two loans I have one with you and one with the bank of Montreal.

Because the bank of Montreal does not take it out consistently on the same day as I had discussed is causing me a problem in my account which is affecting my credit it’s putting me in the hole.

It’s making it difficult it’s caused me to miss multiple payments for my car but yet if you look at my other car payment with you guys there’s not one missing payment

I am now thinking of whether I should just shut my account down and get my check given to me and only go to the bank to cash a check and to take the money and pay everything myself.

I need a solution I need your assistance I need an overdraft I work as a healthcare professional in the community and Cornwall I’ve been with this company for the last year and a half I get paid every two weeks on a Thursday I don’t get very much it’s 1389 every two weeks. When payments come out of my account it’s usually just before I get paid and this causes an NSF I’ve asked for help before with an overdraft I believe because of the NSF‘s this is tarnishing my account please let me know I need a solution .I need your help and I need an overdraft of $500 or even less it could be 300 I need your help

entry.title: Constantly asks to reset password
entry.content: Asks me to reset my password EVERY single time I login to the app. Twitter support helped by resetting over the phone but same issue occurred the next day. Doesn’t seem like there is any solution to this. Customer support replies are nothing but a bunch of robotic answers. UI is great but not being able to login is ridiculous!

Constantly asks to reset password

Asks me to reset my password EVERY single time I login to the app. Twitter support helped by resetting over the phone but same issue occurred the next day. Doesn’t seem like there is any solution to this. Customer support replies are nothing but a bunch of robotic answers. UI is great but not being able to login is ridiculous!

Make it easier

entry.title: Review stats lie!
entry.content:
How is it possible that this app averages 4.6 stars from reviews, when reviewer after reviewer rates it ONE star and writes that they wish they could give it zero stars??
I join those reviewers in the universal frustration over this useless app. What kind of banking or accounting does NOT INCLUDE A RUNNING TOTAL of your balance as transactions are added? I have an overdrawn charge, BUT I WAS NEVER OVERDRAWN to my knowledge. With this useless app I can’t even see a running total balance to figure out where that might have been. Now I have to phone the call centre and wait on hold for up to an hour. WHY HAVE THE APP AT ALL??? What is it good for??

Review stats lie!

How is it possible that this app averages 4.6 stars from reviews, when reviewer after reviewer rates it ONE star and writes that they wish they could give it zero stars??

I join those reviewers in the universal frustration over this useless app. What kind of banking or accounting does NOT INCLUDE A RUNNING TOTAL of your balance as transactions are added? I have an overdrawn charge, BUT I WAS NEVER OVERDRAWN to my knowledge. With this useless app I can’t even see a running total balance to figure out where that might have been. Now I have to phone the call centre and wait on hold for up to an hour. WHY HAVE THE APP AT ALL??? What is it good for??

entry.title: Extremely poor app compared to CIBC
entry.content: You guys don’t offer running balances on the app. Also, no description like the name of the person I send or receive for Email money transfers. When you do an FX at bank it does not show you the transaction with the rate. It just shows the amount of the CAD withdrawal. There needs to be more thought in your app in terms of functionality.

You guys don’t offer running balances on the app. Also, no description like the name of the person I send or receive for Email money transfers. When you do an FX at bank it does not show you the transaction with the rate. It just shows the amount of the CAD withdrawal. There needs to be more thought in your app in terms of functionality.
